com.kuka.common.properties
Class SunriseProjectPropertyStore

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.common.properties.ProjectPropertyStore
      com.kuka.common.properties.SunriseProjectPropertyStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPropertyStore
public class SunriseProjectPropertyStore
extends ProjectPropertyStore

Convenience class for Sunrise project specific access to the project configuration property file.

Constructor.

Parameters:
propertyFile - property file
defaultValues - default content of the property file (used to create it if it gets deleted, lost, ..
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown in case of error

SunriseProjectPropertyStore

public SunriseProjectPropertyStore(java.lang.String defaultValues)
Constructor for a read-only store just returning the default values.

Parameters:
defaultValues - the default content of a property file
Method Detail

getExternalControlFlag

public boolean getExternalControlFlag()
Gets the external control flag. Uses the default value predefined in the properties file if the property is not found.

Returns:
the external control property of the properties file or its default value

setExternalControlFlag

public void setExternalControlFlag(boolean value)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Set the external control flag and writes it into the property file.

Parameters:
value - the value to set
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown in case of error when trying to write value into property file

getDefaultApplication

public java.lang.String getDefaultApplication()
Get the fully qualified class path of the default application as set in the properties file. returns null if the property is not set there.

Returns:
class path of the default application, null if not set

setDefaultApplication

public void setDefaultApplication(java.lang.String classPath)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Writes the given value into the property file.

Parameters:
classPath - fully qualified classPath of the default application
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown in case of error when trying to write value into property file
